[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: AssignmentOperation(
                Assign {
                    left: List {
                        items: [
                            ListItem {
                                key: Some(
                                    LiteralString {
                                        span: Span(
                                            3,
                                            6,
                                        ),
                                        value: "foo",
                                    },
                                ),
                                value: Variable(
                                    SimpleVariable(
                                        SimpleVariable {
                                            span: Span(
                                                3,
                                                15,
                                            ),
                                            name: "a",
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                            },
                        ],
                    },
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        19,
                    ),
                    right: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    21,
                                ),
                                name: "foo",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                },
            ),
            semicolon: Span(
                3,
                25,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
